title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.25 - Trout waters (t or ts)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.25 - Trout waters (t or ts)

State Regulations
(a) The symbol
(T), appearing in an entry in the "standards" column in the classification
tables of Parts 800 through 941 of this Title, means that the classified waters
in that specific item are trout waters. Any water quality standard, guidance
value, or thermal criterion that specifically refers to trout or trout waters
applies. (b) The symbol (TS), appearing in an entry in the "standards" column in the classification tables of

Parts 800 through 941 of this Title, means that the classified waters in that
specific item are trout spawning waters. Any water quality standard, guidance
value, or thermal criterion that specifically refers to trout, trout spawning, trout waters, or trout spawning waters applies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
